website_summaries.verdict: Designed for high-quality bikes using high-quality materials and pick-proof design.
pros: Designed with 13 millimeter shackle and a double bolting shackle
Pick protection is high, with a 15 on the security scale
Two keys, one of which has an LED light, come with lock
Because of the ABUS code card, ordering more keys is easy
cons: This is the most expensive item on our list

customer_reviews.title: Great lock - be prepared - it’s heavy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome - lock No lock is 100% - but this lock has been great I park my bike frequently in high traffic shopping areas - it has been tampered with; but holding up great
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price for the luxury
customer_reviews.text: This lock has a reputation for two things: security and expensiveness. Security alone does not justify the price to protect my $400 bike. I bought it for me, not the bike thieves. I have to carry and operate it. It's light, and it locks and unlocks sooo smoothly. It's the bike lock that makes me feel...pampered. No, I do not sleep with it.
customer_reviews.author: John McGehee

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, quality locks
customer_reviews.text: Watched a review of e-bikes on YouTube about making your bike less desirable to thieves. They recommended ABUS as having really good locks. They stated that all locks can be overcome, but stated that this brand takes a lot more effort than most others. Purchased two of these locks, one for each of our bikes. This is a very heavy duty lock. It definitely will be difficult for someone to cut through this twice, in order to steal our bikes. The fit and finish of the lock is impeccable. This was a bit of a budget buster, so hopefully in the near future we can afford to purchase the matching chain locks.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Hood

customer_reviews.title: it's been fine. However
customer_reviews.text: I tried a highly rated lock from Kryptonite, but after sending back two defective examples, I decided to spend more for the Abus. So far, it's been fine. However, the mounting hardware is a bit unusual, so that I couldn't find a satisfactory location on my bike for it. Fortunately, I can stow the lock in my pannier.
customer_reviews.author: Th.C.Sid

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months. Arduous replacement policy.
customer_reviews.text: This lock feels indestructible, but the key is now permanently stuck in the lock with my bike locked to a rack. ABUS will not replace the lock unless I return it to dealer where I bought it for inspection. That dealer was Amazon, and the return window is long gone. I can ship the lock to ABUS to have them inspect it and determine if a replacement is warranted, but it's stuck on my bike/bike rack and even if I could get it off I would be without a lock for a few weeks. I recommend going with Kryptonite bike locks instead, as I have one of those that I purchased in 2005 that still works great 15 years later.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: which is great for safety
customer_reviews.text: This lock is SOLID, which is great for safety. The only reason I gave it 4 stars was because it is really heavy. We bought if for my son to lock his bike up at school and it was too heavy to put in his backpack. We ended up getting him a basket to store the lock in. The other thing he didn't like was that it is hard to lock the frame to the bike rack at his school because it obviously doesn't have the length of a cable lock. It can be a bit tricky to get it locked up but once you do, you can feel good knowing its secure.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Ali

customer_reviews.title: Tough lock for real protection of your bike
customer_reviews.text: Great lock; my daughter has a "girls" bike" and it didn't really have anywhere that we could mount the lock so she has to carry it in her backpack when she's riding. But it is very sturdy and we feel that it provides great protection for her bike (on a college campus). She uses this lock to secure the front wheel and frame to the post, but also uses a Kryptonite chain to lace through the rear tire (not as a secure, but faster than using 2 U-locks).
customer_reviews.author: PediatricianMom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lock at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Significantly lighter than the equivalent Kryptonite product, and for me, that was enough to warrant purchasing it. Further, significantly more Kryptonite reviewers noted problems with their locks getting jammed up and the key not turning in the lock, this despite application of lock appropriate lube. This happened with Abus users, but it was a lot less. This lock was made in Germany, the Kryptonite lock is made in China. To me, that says a lot about why there is a difference. I've had this lock for about two days, so we will see how it goes. Lock was shipped quickly, and weirdly, there was no packing material in the box. Not that the lock really needed any, but still.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Wagstaff

customer_reviews.title: This Is The Bike Lock!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on bike locks before choosing this one. This is one of the highest rated locks (of the other two, one weighs a ton and the other is almost $300). It was number one against lock picking and it's extremely resistant to a grinder with a titanium blade in spite of its 16mm shackle. Never mind bolt cutters. It's designed to resist extreme torque as well. It's easy to mount and rests sturdy. No rattling. Besides its amazing strengths, it's relatively light in weight. This is my main lock. Although, I obviously don't rely on only one lock. The other is its rival in the same category. The other weighs a ton, tough.
customer_reviews.author: sean2tall

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, but gives a sense of security too.
customer_reviews.text: This lock is a bit heavy, but you do not want a light, cheap lock for your bike. This lock is strong and easy to use. It comes with two keys, one with a led light on it. I love this lock and feel very secure with it on my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Beeman

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a beast!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a strong and reliable lock to secure my bike around campus. This works. Pros: Thick, hardened steel shackle. Lightweight for its size and strength. Thin layer of rubberized material on the inside of the shackle to protect the paint on your bike. Key retention, so that the key can only be removed when in the "locked" position; never accidentally leave your bike unlocked! One key has a handy little LED light built in. Also comes with a smaller spare. Included card with personalized code to order new keys. Cons: None, absolutely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Kerley

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, well made, good experience with previous ABUS products
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, very heavy and well made. I'm using in conjunction with the Abus Bordo GRANIT X plus link lock. Mainly because it's an electric folding bike with high price tag and I need to protect the front electric motor wheel and the rear internal geared hub. I'm pretty confident these will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: zeemema

customer_reviews.title: Would rather use a bunch of rope
customer_reviews.text: Was beat off frame of bike, would never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nick O

customer_reviews.title: Tough lock
customer_reviews.text: This little dude is tough! Hard steel, both sides lock, cant drill the locking mechanism, and fits around the rear tire/frame with full suspension bikes. Still need a chain for the front wheel and the post your locking it to but this lock is on to stay.
customer_reviews.author: 1WorldWayne

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be the best on the market but still meager protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for a $4000.00 ebike. In two minutes, they can be cut off with a battery powered tool, but I guess that's the best I can do to protect the bike. Smooth key and closing operation, as you would expect from German engineering Ingenious mounting system. Different sized cylinder inserts for smaller bars. The rear rack is perfect to mount the 12 inch. The 9 inch fits in my trunk pack. The (limited) peace of mind is worth the $250 investment.
customer_reviews.author: fynnlarie

customer_reviews.title: She's happy with this gift!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We gave her another brand several months ago. She was not happy with it, didn't feel it was secure enough . She requested we replace the first purchased item. She is now VERY happy. She thinks this bicycle lock is MUCH more sturdier than the other and feels far more comfortable when she locks her bikes for a walk, hiker....whatever! She's happy with this gift!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dimples 22

customer_reviews.title: The most practical deterrent that is reasonable to carry and use
customer_reviews.text: I researched the security level of many different locks. An expert who teaches lock picking and bypass mentioned Abus as one of the best brands to defeat such efforts. The only way to get into this lock is through brute Force. I'm sure that is possible, but as long as I have a better lock than the guy next to me, most criminals will move on to an easier lock.
customer_reviews.author: EAA

customer_reviews.title: Very solid lock, but the key is tricky
customer_reviews.text: By and far probably the best lock out there. BUT, the key is starting to be sketchy, after a year or so. I'm worried one of these days it'll just get stuck completely and my bike will be trapped.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Well no-one has stolen my bike so far...
customer_reviews.text: Who, really, is equipped to review a bike lock? It _looks_ tough. It opens and closes as expected. I think it's good. I hope it's good. ==> No mounting bracket <== I wedge it into the rack on the back of my bike, but really it should come with a bracket, something is wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: Graham King

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product feels like a quality u lock. Though no lock is 100% guaranteed I feel confident that it will deter someone from attempting to break it if you leave your bike out for a while. It would've been nice if it came with some theft insurance the way kryptonite does.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R.

customer_reviews.title: Good locks, but batteries?
customer_reviews.text: Two locks arrived in less than week. Both in perfect condition despite a box holding together with only a hope and a prayer. But what in the world was a twelve-pack of D-cell batteries doing in the box? Someone packing this was not paying attention. Amazon needs to use better boxes for shipping heavy items, and check contents before closing up the box. Hope we didn’t pay for the extra three pounds the batteries added to the weight. Bizarre. Still, happy with locks and can find no faults.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wescott Loder

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Solid Lock. You really can't Bitch about it. Two thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: The price is high but is your bike nice & worth not getting ripped off of yes then id look into This. Make sure you buy the right one with mounting bracket, I bought it & it doesn't come with one so gotta buy separately. There are sellers that sell both bracket & lock together for much cheaper than buyin them separately. I bought them separate & learned my lesson by paying a little bit more but hey good lock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lock!
customer_reviews.text: I used Krytonite locks in the past, but after using this lock, I don't think I'll ever go back. It's strong but light enough to carry in a messenger bag without issue. Locking/unlocking is super smooth unlike my Kryptonite locks that would leave my fingers in pain. Can't praise this lock enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Quality lock.
customer_reviews.text: Love this lock, don't love the price. However, it's the same price on Amazon than pretty much everywhere else..
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: My "Go-to" travel lock.  Pricey, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The best U-lock on the market, in my opinion. It's expensive, but when protecting an expensive bike, what price security?? The best thing about it is the German construction, and the DOUBLE end locks, requiring only one key and one key hole. Anyone who calls this lock "heavy," obviously has never tested the other high security U-locks out there, that's for sure.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be pre-owned
customer_reviews.text: Item appears to have been used. Seems sturdy enough, but for over $100, I kinda expect one that isn’t already all beat up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 9" U Lock, works, nothing shorter.
customer_reviews.text: It works great, I use a Velcro tie down strap, to help hold it, and keep it from rattling,
customer_reviews.author: E4S

customer_reviews.title: It is a heavy lock
customer_reviews.text: I like the apparent sturdiness of the lock. Feels like it would take some time to grind thru it. Bolt cutter might not be a good tool to use on it. The tradeoff is that it is a bit heavy. Not an issue for me, but some might not like it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric C Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Best bike lock
customer_reviews.text: I studied many reviews before spending the higher amount of money on this lock, and it is well worth the price. Super sturdy, lock mechanism doesn’t jam like kryptonite locks tend to. I feel like my bike is safe with this lock.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Strong lock
customer_reviews.text: Looks strong and is heavy. Should slow down the most determined thief. Did not use the mounting bracket though it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Techtm

customer_reviews.title: Great peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Having read lots of reviews, this is the lock that I finally decided on. It's rather heavy, but that should be a good indicator of the quality of the lock and materials used. I haven't used it too often, but it always locks securely and gives me the peace of mind to leave my bike unattended.
customer_reviews.author: Ben L.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I can’t imagine anyone breaking this lock off. It would definitely be a challenge for the thief, and since most bike thieves are opportunists, I’m fairly confident a bike locked with this lock would not be their go-to to steal.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: no
customer_reviews.text: i do not use it to big and can not use a lot of places so i do not, should have sent back.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: This lock has been great! Several other students have had their bikes messed ...
customer_reviews.text: This lock has been great! Several other students have had their bikes messed with but they don't even give mine a second thought. No attempted thefts so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive look and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty lock, looks impressive and strong. Works well. Heavily built.
customer_reviews.author: andrew g

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It may be expensive, but so far totally worth it. Locks and unlocks like butter. Very sturdy. The holder it comes with to attach it to your bike frame is an awesome addition
customer_reviews.author: jazzisjazz

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable
customer_reviews.text: Very well-made. Locks on both sides to give added security. Very durable easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: rojr710

customer_reviews.title: 4 pounds of peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I definitely take comfort in knowing I have the hardest lock to break on the rack. Highly recommenced if you can get it for the right price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Friedberg

customer_reviews.title: It's just a deterrent
customer_reviews.text: It gives me the comfort to run into a store for a few minutes with my OneWheel mounted to my soft top Jeep.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Bronosky

customer_reviews.title: Good lock, just not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Good lock, but living is a high thief area, I choose a different, what I feel was better for my purpose
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and mount to my bike. Definitely worth the investment to protect my bike from theft.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Padilla Jr

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Strong and easy to use. I can now secure my bike with confidence that it will be there when I return.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Kacprzak

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy lock.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. I have a krytonite lock and I don’t like the fact I have to fiddle with the key to get it to open. The Abus is smooth and extremely sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: PROTECTED MY BIKE FROM BEING STOLEN!  3/29/2020
customer_reviews.text: Someone tried to use a lifting jack to take my bike! But, this locked still held strong! Thanks to this lock, I still have my bike!
customer_reviews.author: BIGDADDY

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but solid lock
customer_reviews.text: I use this to secure my bike at work... and it stays there... it's heavy but that's what you pay for in security... seems to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin J. Grassi

customer_reviews.title: doesn't come with a holder!
customer_reviews.text: It's good, but so heavy! And it doesn't come with a holder, so that makes it very annoying to use!
customer_reviews.author: Amir

customer_reviews.title: I have been very happy with it so far
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with it so far. I have a hard time understanding why a person would want the 12" version unless locking multiple bikes though.
customer_reviews.author: GRM

customer_reviews.title: Works great, no problems
customer_reviews.text: I think it's better than the Kryptonite Brand, it's very sturdy and stiff, with easy unlocking/locking using the key. No problems after over a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lock, worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This thing just rocks on so many levels. I feel confident using it at almost any location
customer_reviews.author: Felix Sky

customer_reviews.title: No one's stolen my bike yet.
customer_reviews.text: No one's stolen my bike yet if that changes I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and wide enough to lock the frame and the rear tire. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: As good as any deterrent gets
customer_reviews.text: Good luck getting my expensive mountain bike with this lock!
customer_reviews.author: Brett Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Good Security
customer_reviews.text: Quality lock, but it is pretty heavy. I'm using this as my commuter lock, and putting it in my backpack adds quite a bit of weight. However, good security comes at a price.
customer_reviews.author: DDD

customer_reviews.title: quality doesn't come without the weight
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed when I got this. It feels incredibly solid. A word of caution to consumers, it's heavier than you think it is. Also, do yourself a favor and buy the one with USH connector. I got mine mounted on with 3 Velcro strap in the frame of my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Jovan Roetz

customer_reviews.title: Really nice German security device for your bike.
customer_reviews.text: Long enough for my scooter and a nearby post or rack. Beautiful mechanical sound when operated, makes me think of a bank vault door closing. Rubberized covering seems quite tough. Not terribly heavy but would make a fine defensive weapon should you happen to need one.
customer_reviews.author: Knotmename

customer_reviews.title: Lock looks sturdy, I would have given a 5 star
customer_reviews.text: Lock looks sturdy, I would have given a 5 star, but the key that has the light did not have the battery holder or battery. I would have to send the lock back, it wasn’t worth the time to send it back. I am happy with the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Bam. Superman lock
customer_reviews.text: Solid. Definite deterrent. Big enough to get around bike parts
customer_reviews.author: kevin cullen

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a solid enough lock
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a solid enough lock. The real test is to see if somebody opens it and steels my bike.
customer_reviews.author: martin zinbergs

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bike mount is NOT included in price!! Costs an extra ~25usd.
customer_reviews.author: Dominik Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy yet not long enough for new Trek
customer_reviews.text: Far heavier than expected. Won't fit ladies Trek hybrid when trying to lock bike to small diameter bike rack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont trust this
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid lock and very heavy but it lasted only one time and the lock got unrepairable stuck thank god we were;t out riding as getting this off at a bike stand would have been quite challenging. I heard great things about ABUS but for the price this was a major disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: tmybrgr

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and sturdy lock. The key turns smoothly, high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Smart rat

product_meta.title: ABUS Granit XPlus 540/160 HB 230, 9 Inch U Bike Lock, 111617
product_meta.description: The Granit X-Plus 540 is the flagship bicycle U-Lock from ABUS. Ideal for urban settings and high quality bicycles needing strong theft protection, the 540 features a patented 13mm temper hardened steel square parabolic shackle and a double bolting shackle/lock body. Patented ABUS Power Cell technology offers the highest protection against hitting and pulling attacks while the X-Plus Key cylinder offers extremely high protection from picking. The 540 can be keyed alike with other ABUS locks featuring the same X-Plus cylinder - very convenient for multi-lock and multi-bike households. All ABUS locks offer industry leading corrosion resistance. 13mm patented square parabolic shackle Double bolting shackle/lock body The shackle, case and supporting elements of the lock mechanism are all made of special temper hardened steel ABUS X-Plus Cylinder offers the highest protection against picking Two keys supplied with lock, one with LED light Automatic keyhole cover protects against dirt and corrosion ABUS Code Card makes ordering additional or replacement keys easy
feature_bullets: Double locking, High Pulling resistance, Includes "Lighted Key!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
